name: Bob
description: Bob is, well, Bob. There is nothing special about Bob. Oh Wait I kno- ...Nevermind.

name: Lisa
description: Lisa once saw a glass fall onto the floor and she picked up a shard. That is when she knew what she would want to be.

name: Richard
description: Richard does not like to be hit, that's why he trains his cardio daily as the local gym.

name: Tracy
description: Tracy likes ice cream. Also, she knows how to fight.

name: Antonius
description: Antonius is such a fan of rocks that he became one.

name: Jack
description: Jack is a man who can only think of money, it's also the reason he's venturing forth into the dungeon. However, physically he is not very strong. He takes a bag of money with him.
